mapper.insert:
insert into domain_info
domain_info.domain,
domain_info.domain_id,
domain_info.encoding,
domain_info.http_protocal,
domain_info.max_speed, domain_info.need_cookie,
domain_info.remark,
domain_info.type,
values
#{domain},
#{domainId},
#{encoding},
#{httpProtocal},
#{maxSpeed}, #{needCookie},
#{remark},
#{type},
mapper.update:
update domain_info
domain_info.domain = #{domain},
domain_info.domain_id = #{domainId},
domain_info.encoding = #{encoding},
domain_info.http_protocal = #{httpProtocal},
domain_info.max_speed = #{maxSpeed},
domain_info.need_cookie = #{needCookie},
domain_info.remark = #{remark},
domain_info.type = #{type}
domain_info.id = #{id}
mapper.select:
select domain_info.domain, domain_info.domain_id, domain_info.encoding, domain_info.http_protocal, domain_info.id, domain_info.max_speed, domain_info.need_cookie, domain_info.remark, domain_info.type form domain_info
domain_info.id = #{id}
